text: Princess Charlotte looks just like her royal relatives. John Stillwell - WPA Pool / Getty The royal family's most recent Christmas card immediately sparked discussion when it was released last year. Not just about whether Kate Middleton's blue dress and was a sneaky hint about the gender of her third child — but also about Princess Charlotte's uncanny resemblance to her great - grandmother, Queen Elizabeth II. She also recently stole the show by greeting her adoring crowd with a regal wave when her new baby brother was born. The similarities don't end with the Queen, as Charlotte also bears a resemblance to other members of the royal family, such as her mother Kate Middleton and late grandmother Princess Diana. From her facial features to her adorably stylish outfits — here are 16 times Princess Charlotte looked just like
